Player History
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 7/29/1989 with a Bruised Neck, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1991, off Bret Saberhagen (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/1991, off Brad Arnsberg (NYY)...
Traded from Texas to Atlanta on 6/2/1991 (Going to ATL: CF Sammy Sosa. Going to TEX: P Andy Ashby, P Ben McDonald, 3B Jeff Blauser, CF Al Martin)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/1991, hitting .538 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/1991, hitting .438 with 5 HR, 9 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 7/17/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/1991, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1991, hitting .351 with 12 HR, 31 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1991, hitting .279 with 21 HR, 84 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/1992, hitting .481 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/1992, hitting .529 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,850,000 through salary arbitration...
